txt.en: You should return to Candúr and inform him of your deeds within Skoironk.

The invaders of Skoironk are numerous. Driving off even a fraction of their number will better position the Host of the West to travel safely through The Wastes.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Skoironk: Driver of Fear to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
'You have done well, friend. Your efforts will be duly noted!'

The invaders of Skoironk are numerous. Driving off even a fraction of their number will better position the Host of the West to travel safely through The Wastes.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Skoironk: Driver of Fear to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
To weaken the resolve of the invaders within Skoironk, you take it upon yourself to thin their numbers.
